SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Argument
This annotation is used in the context of a configuration bean specification to mark a property that receives the value of a command line argument.
ArgumentParser
The parser for the command line arguments.
BooleanAccessor
The implementation of PreferenceAccessor for Boolean.
BooleanValueHandler
An implementation of CmdLineValueHandler for boolean and Boolean values.
BulkDataAccessorBase<T>
The abstract base class for an implementation of PreferenceAccessor for bulk data.
ByteAccessor
The implementation of PreferenceAccessor for instance of Byte.
CheckEmpty
Used with a setter and indicates that a EmptyArgumentException should be thrown when the new value for the property is empty.
CheckNull
Used with a setter and indicates that a NullArgumentException should be thrown when the new value for the property is null.
ClassRegistry
This class is meant as a place to hold the predefined implementations of CmdLineValueHandler for classes that are not covered by SimpleCmdLineValueHandler, either because there is no implementation of StringConverter for that class, or because the CmdLineValueHandler allows additional settings.
CLIArgumentDefinition
Run-time copy of the @Argument annotation.
CLIBeanSpec
When a configuration bean should be initialised from the command line, the respective specification interface needs to extend this interface.
CLIDefinition
Base class for the run-time copies of the @Option or @Argument annotation.
CLIDefinitionParser
Parses an XML CLI definition file.
CLIDefinitionParser.CLIDefinitionResolver
An implementation of XMLResolver for this parser.
CLIDefinitionParser.ExceptionLocation
An implementation of Location.
CLIOptionDefinition
Run-time copy of the Option annotation.
CmdLineException
Signals an error in the user input.
CmdLineValueHandler<T>
The abstract base class for the value handler that takes a String value from the command line, translates it to the target type and sets the value to the property.
CollectionAccessor<T,C>
The abstract base class for implementations of PreferenceAccessor for instances of implementations of Collection.
Commons
The internal tools for the configuration module.
ConfigBeanSpec
The base for the specification of a configuration bean; the final specification interface must also be annotated with @ConfigurationBeanSpecification in order to be recognised properly.
ConfigChangeListenerSupport
Provides support for the event handling to the configuration beans.
ConfigInitException
This exception type is used to signal a problem with the initialisation of a configuration bean.
ConfigurationBeanSpecification
The marker for a configuration bean specification.
ConfigurationChangeEvent
The event object that is thrown each time a property of a configuration bean is changed.
ConfigurationChangeListener
The definition of a listener for configuration change events.
ConfigUtil
Utility methods that can be used to handle configuration beans.
DateAccessor
The implementation of PreferenceAccessor for instances of Date.
DateValueHandler
An implementation of CmdLineValueHandler for Date values.
DocumentValueHandler
An implementation of CmdLineValueHandler for Document values.

The Document will be identified by the name of the respective File object that of course has to exist and needs to be accessible.
DoubleAccessor
The implementation of PreferenceAccessor for instances of Double.
EnumAccessor<T>
The implementation of PreferenceAccessor for classes that extends Enum.
EnumValueHandler<T>
An implementation of CmdLineValueHandler for types that are derived from Enum.
EnvironmentVariable
This annotation indicates that the property for the annotated getter is initialised from an environment variable with the given name.
ExemptFromToString
Excludes the value of the property belonging to annotated getter from being included into the output of Object.toString().
FloatAccessor
The implementation of PreferenceAccessor for instances of Float.
I18nSupport
A configuration bean specification has to extend this interface in order to get the i18n support.
ImageAccessor
The implementation of PreferenceAccessor for instances of BufferedImage.
ImageValueHandler
An implementation of CmdLineValueHandler for BufferedImage values.
INIBeanSpec
When a configuration bean should be connected with an INI file (a Windows style configuration file), the respective configuration bean specification interface needs to extend this interface.
INIFileConfig
The definition of an INI file that is used in the context of a configuration bean implementing INIBeanSpec.
INIGroup
The definition for a INI file group.
INIGroups
The container for @INIGroup annotations.
INIValue
The marker for properties that will be persisted in an INI file.
InstantValueHandler
The implementation of TimeValueHandler for Instant.
IntegerAccessor
The implementation of PreferenceAccessor for instances of Integer.
InvalidPreferenceValueException
The is exception will be thrown by implementations of PreferenceAccessor in cases when the value from the preferences node (that is stored there as a String) cannot be converted into the target format, for whatever reason.
ListAccessor<T>
The implementation of PreferenceAccessor for instances of List.
LocalDateTimeValueHandler
The implementation of TimeValueHandler for LocalDateTime.
LocalDateValueHandler
The implementation of TimeValueHandler for java.time.LocalDate.
LocalTimeValueHandler
The implementation of TimeValueHandler for LocalTime.
LongAccessor
The implementation of PreferenceAccessor for instances of Long.
MapAccessor<K,V>
The implementation of PreferenceAccessor for instances of Map.
MessageRegistry
This class is meant as a place to hold the specific error messages for the failed conversion of command line entries.
MessageRegistry.MessageRegistryEntry
An entry for the registry.
NoPreference
Excludes the property from having a preferences reference.
Option
This annotation is used in the context of a configuration bean specification to mark a property that receives the value of a command line option.
Parameters
Provides access to a list of arguments on the command line.
Preference
Forces a property to have a preferences reference and configures it.
PreferenceAccessor<T>
The abstract base class for the preference accessors.
PreferenceAccessorBase<T>
The abstract base class for custom implementations of PreferenceAccessor.
PreferenceChangeListenerBase
This class provides the base for an implementation of a change listener for the connected USER Preferences as defined through the interfaces NodeChangeListener and PreferenceChangeListener.
PreferenceChangeListenerImpl
This class provides the implementation for the preferences change listeners as defined through the interfaces NodeChangeListener and PreferenceChangeListener.
PreferencesBeanSpec
When a configuration bean should be connected with Preferences, the respective configuration bean specification interface needs to extend this interface.
PreferencesException
The exception that is thrown from a configuration bean in case an operation on the connected Preferences instance fails.
PreferencesRoot
Provides some general configuration settings for a configuration bean that implements PreferencesBeanSpec.
PrimitiveBooleanAccessor
The implementation of PreferenceAccessor for boolean.
PrimitiveByteAccessor
The implementation of PreferenceAccessor for byte.
PrimitiveDoubleAccessor
The implementation of PreferenceAccessor for double.
PrimitiveFloatAccessor
The implementation of PreferenceAccessor for float.
PrimitiveIntAccessor
The implementation of PreferenceAccessor for int.
PrimitiveLongAccessor
The implementation of PreferenceAccessor for long.
PrimitiveShortAccessor
The implementation of PreferenceAccessor for Short.
SessionBeanSpec
The interface for a configuration bean that allows multiple instances ("Sessions").
SetAccessor<T>
The implementation of PreferenceAccessor for instances of Set.
ShortAccessor
The implementation of PreferenceAccessor for Short.
SimpleBulkDataAccessor<T>
The abstract implementation of BulkDataAccessorBase for bulk data where an instance of StringConverter can be provided for the property data type.
SimpleCmdLineValueHandler<T>
The implementation of CmdLineValueHandler for all those types for that an implementation of StringConverter exists.
SimplePreferenceAccessor<T>
The implementations of PreferenceAccessor that uses the given instance of StringConverter to translate the values back and forth.
SpecialProperty
This annotation is used to mark getters and setters that are implemented in a special way.
SpecialPropertyType
The types of the special properties for a configuration bean.
StringAccessor
The implementation of PreferenceAccessor for instances of String.
StringConversion
This annotation defines the implementation of StringConverter that is used to convert the value of annotated property into a String, or a String into the value.
StringValueHandler
An implementation of CmdLineValueHandler for String values.
SystemPreference
This annotation indicates that the property for the annotated getter is initialised from a SYSTEM Preferences value with the path and name.
SystemProperty
This annotation indicates that the property for the annotated getter is initialised from a system property with the given name.
TextAccessor
The implementation of PreferenceAccessor for instances of Document.
TimeValueHandler<T>
The abstract base class for implementations of CmdLineValueHandler for types that extend Temporal.
UsageBuilder
Builds the usage message that will be printed to the console (or wherever) in case help is requested on the command line, or an invalid option or argument is provided on it.
YearMonthValueHandler
The implementation of TimeValueHandler for YearMonth.
YearValueHandler
The implementation of TimeValueHandler for Year.
YesNoValueHandler
An implementation of CmdLineValueHandler for boolean and Boolean values that does accept also "yes", "qui", "ja", "sÃ­", "sÃ¬", "Ð´Ð°", "sim", "tak" and more as true.
YesNoValueHandler.YesNoStringConverter
An implementation of StringConverter that translates 'yes' in various languages into true.
ZonedDateTimeValueHandler
The implementation of TimeValueHandler for ZonedDateTime.
